page.title: 09Housing in Newborough.
page.content: The most common type of houses in the sample are bungalows and detached houses.There are nine semi-detached but no terraces.The most popular type of building material is brick.Other houses are made of either wood or stone. Most houses have five or six rooms.A few houses have more than seven.Most of the houses have a small to spacious garden,though three houses did have very large gardens.Just over half the gardens have vegetables growing in them.Tomatoes are the most popular food grown with beans,potatoes,peas and cabbages planted in smaller proportions. The majority of households also keep pets with cats and dogs the most popular.Most households use solid fuel as heating closely followed by oil.
